$vee-validate.alpha: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters
$vee-validate.alpha_dash: The {_field_} field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
$vee-validate.alpha_num: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
$vee-validate.alpha_spaces: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
$vee-validate.between: The {_field_} field must be between {min} and {max}
$vee-validate.confirmed: The {_field_} field confirmation does not match
$vee-validate.digits: The {_field_} field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
$vee-validate.dimensions: The {_field_} field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
$vee-validate.email: The {_field_} field must be a valid email
$vee-validate.excluded: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
$vee-validate.ext: The {_field_} field is not a valid file
$vee-validate.image: The {_field_} field must be an image
$vee-validate.integer: The {_field_} field must be an integer
$vee-validate.max: The {_field_} field may not be greater than {length} characters
$vee-validate.max_value: The {_field_} field must be {max} or less
$vee-validate.mimes: The {_field_} field must have a valid file type
$vee-validate.min: The {_field_} field must be at least {length} characters
$vee-validate.min_length: The {_field_} field must have at least {length} items
$vee-validate.min_value: The {_field_} field must be {min} or more
$vee-validate.numeric: The {_field_} field may only contain numeric characters
$vee-validate.oneOf: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
$vee-validate.size: The {_field_} field size must be less than {size}KB
